messages.text: Hello All. Just pinging this group to see if there are people active in this community in India.

messages.text: Hi Vaibhav, Rohit. I am based in Delhi and run a company which uses Julia for building statistical learning algorithms. What about your guys.

messages.text:
Society for Data Science, BIT Mesra welcomes <https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAnTy8wBvpUtyM7UXjuSEi3AMHdARzfYN8M|Chris Rackauckas>, Applied Mathematics Instructor at <https://www.linkedin.com/school/18494/?legacySchoolId=18494|Massachusetts Institute of Technology>, as our speaker for Data Science Summit'21.

Topic: Scientific Machine Learning: More Predictive ML with Less Data
Date: 26th February 2021
Time: 7:00 PM(IST)

Dr. Rackauckas is the lead developer of the SciML Open Source Software ecosystem and the <https://www.linkedin.com/company/pumas-ai/|Pumas-AI, Inc.> pharmacometrics platform. His research and software is focused on Scientific AI and Scientific Machine Learning: the integration of domain models with machine learning.

Dr. Rackauckas is at the cutting edge of mathematical methods for scientific simulation. He is the lead developer of the DifferentialEquations.jl solver suite along with over a hundred other Julia packages, earning him the inaugural Julia Community Prize and front page features in tech community sites.

We sincerely thank him for taking out time to enlighten us on him phenomenal work in Data Science.

Don't miss your chance to be a part of this session!
Registration Link : <https://www.eventbrite.com/e/pie-ai-ranchi-data-science-summit21-tickets-142106262657>

messages.text:
Speaking at Shaastra on Sunday. Requesting help in spreading the word. I’ll be issuing a call to action for joining the julia community and contributing to open source, julia, and talking about science and computing as being essential in solving problems like pandemic and climate change.

Instagram: <https://www.instagram.com/p/CLoG6fwAHid/?igshid=1qky9w4u6upia> 
Twitter: <https://twitter.com/ShaastraIITM/status/1364232489942716422?s=20> 
LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/posts/shaastra-iit-madras_dr-viral-shah-co-founder-ceo-julia-language-activity-6769906616717320192-vJvy>
YouTube: <https://youtu.be/WYTwtLSO02w>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/ShaastraIITM|@ShaastraIITM>: Shaastra Spotlight in association with UpSkill - an initiative aimed at improving CS education in India, proudly presents the final addition to this year’s stellar lineup - Dr. Viral Shah, Co-founder - CEO of Julia
Catch him live - 28th Feb (Sun) @ 5:00 PM
<https://youtu.be/WYTwtLSO02w> <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Eu65soZVkAgNexk.jpg>
